title: Nine Kilometers of Love
overview: A story that follows six twenty-something flying cadets in the journey to become full-fledged pilots.Coming from a family in the aviation industry, Lin Shu was influenced by his father to pursue a career as a professional pilot. After graduating from flight school, Lin Shu gets one step closer to his dream as he find work at an airline company. Together with Jiang Yi Ming and Zhou Yu Hang, they become the new generation of flying cadets. Lin Shu also crosses paths with Cheng Cheng, the 'conceited young lady' who starts off on the wrong foot with him.
